annotation_sentence: Yes, yes, it is Nuch. Who is speaking, please?

annotation_sentence: Oh! Lek! I am good, thank you. How about you?

annotation_sentence: Oh, um, try the market at night. Very good food!

annotation_sentence: Yes, yes. Let’s talk again soon. Bye-bye!
